root.toolbar:fileCount: Number of files in the current folder
root.toolbar:removeMarkedFiles: Move marked files to the trash
root.toolbar:unlinkMarkedFiles: Remove marked files from the current folder
root.toolbar:search:title: Search documents by 15NC
root.folders:msg:addFolder:failure: Failed to add the new folder.
root.files:name: Name
root.files:sub:failure: Failed to change the subscription state.
root.files:components:help: Components assigned to this document. If an order has one of the specified components, then this document will be added to the list in the document browser app with a requirement to confirm that it was read.
root.unlinkFiles:title: Unlinking files
root.unlinkFiles:message: Are you sure you want to remove the marked documents from the current folder?
root.unlinkFiles:remove: Some of the marked documents reside only in the current folder:
root.unlinkFiles:remove:0: ignore documents residing in a single folder.
root.unlinkFiles:remove:1: move documents residing in a single folder to Trash.
root.removeFiles:title: Removing documents
root.removeFiles:message:remove:
Are you sure you want to remove the marked documents?

Removed documents will be moved to Trash.
root.removeFiles:message:purge:
Are you sure you want to purge the marked documents?

Documents that reside in other folders than Trash will be removed only from Trash.

Documents residing only in Trash will be purged completely and irreversibly.
root.removeFile:title: Removing document
root.removeFile:message:single:
Are you sure you want to remove the {nc15} document?

Removed document will be moved to Trash.
root.removeFile:message:multiple:
Document {nc15} resides in multiple folders.

You can unlink it from the current folder or move it to Trash.
root.removeFile:message:single:purge: Are you sure you want to purge the {nc15} document?
root.removeFile:message:multiple:purge:
Document {nc15} resides in multiple folders.

You can unlink it from the current folder or purge it completely and irreversibly.
root.recoverFiles:title: Recovering documents
root.recoverFiles:message: Are you sure you want to recover the marked documents?
root.recoverFiles:remove: Some of the documents resided in folders that no longer exist:
root.recoverFiles:remove:0: ignore documents, that cannot be recovered to the old folders.
root.recoverFile:title: Recovering document
root.recoverFile:message: Are you sure you want to recover the {nc15} document?
root.editFile:title: Editing document
root.purgeFolder:title: Purging folder
root.purgeFolder:message: Are you sure you want to completely and irreversibly remove the {folder} folder?
root.purgeFolder:message:trash: Are you sure you want to completely and irreversibly clean the Trash?
root.uploads:msg:notAllowed: You don't have permissions to add files.
root.uploads:msg:noFolder: Files cannot be added to the root folder.
root.uploads:msg:folderIsTrash: Files cannot be added to the Trash.
